SELECT mp.PROD_CD as prodCd , mp.PROD_NM as prodNm , mp.AUTHOR_NM as authorNm , mp.S_PRICE as sPrice , fh.AGENT_CD as agentCd , ag.AGENT_NM as agentNm , if(fh.AGENT_CD != '', 'Y', 'N') as chYn , fh.STOP_YN as stopYn , count(fh.PROD_CD) as hCnt FROM MPRODTB mp -- 선인세check left outer join SFEESHTB as fh ON fh.PROD_CD = mp.PROD_CD -- 에이젠트 구분 left outer join MAGENTTB as ag on ag.AGENT_CD = mp.AGENT_CD
WHERE 1=1
AND fh.AGENT_CD != ''
AND fh.STOP_YN = #{paramStopYn}
AND ( mp.PROD_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValue }, '%' ) OR mp.PROD_CD LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValue }, '%') OR ag.AGENT_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValue }, '%') )
GROUP BY mp.PROD_CD ORDER BY mp.PROD_CD

SELECT fh.PROD_CD as prodCd , fh.AGENT_CD as agentCd , ag.AGENT_NM as agentNm , fh.FEES_SDAY as feesSday , fh.FEES_EDAY as feesEday , fh.CALC_FG as calcFg , fh.COND_FG as condFg FROM SFEESHTB fh -- 에이젠트 구분 left outer join MAGENTTB as ag ON ag.AGENT_CD = fh.AGENT_CD
WHERE fh.PROD_CD = #{paramProdCd } ORDER BY fh.AGENT_CD

SELECT fh.PROD_CD as prodCd , fh.AGENT_CD as agentCd , fh.AGENT_CD as oldAgentCd , ag.AGENT_NM as agentNm , fh.FEES_SDAY as feesSday , fh.FEES_EDAY as feesEday , fh.CALC_FG as calcFg , fh.COND_FG as condFg , fh.STOP_YN as stopYn , fh.REMARKS as remarks FROM SFEESHTB fh -- 에이젠트 구분 left outer join MAGENTTB as ag ON ag.AGENT_CD = fh.AGENT_CD
WHERE fh.PROD_CD = #{paramProdCd } AND fh.AGENT_CD = #{paramAgentCd }

SELECT fd.PROD_CD as prodCd , fd.AGENT_CD as agentCd , fd.AGENT_CD as oldAgentCd , fd.SEQ as seq , fd.BASE_QTY as baseQty , fd.BASE_YUL as baseYul , fd.BASE_AMT as baseAmt , fd.REMARKS as remarks , "R" as iuD FROM SFEESDTB fd
where fd.PROD_CD = #{paramProdCd } AND fd.AGENT_CD = #{paramAgentCd } order by fd.SEQ

SELECT mp.PROD_CD as prodCd , mp.PROD_NM as prodNm , mp.PROD_CL as prodCl -- 1:국내 2:국외 , IF(mp.PROD_CL = '1','국내',if(mp.PROD_CL = '2', '국외', '')) as prodClNm , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY mp.PROD_CD ORDER BY fh.FEES_SDAY) as agentSeq , fh.AGENT_CD as agentCd , CONCAT(STR_TO_DATE(fh.FEES_SDAY, '%Y%m%d'), ' ~ ', STR_TO_DATE(fh.FEES_EDAY, '%Y%m%d')) as feesPeriod , fh.FEES_EDAY as feesEday , fh.REMARKS as remarks , ag.AGENT_NM as agentNm , (SELECT count(*) FROM SFEESWTB fw WHERE fw.PROD_CD = mp.PROD_CD AND fw.AGENT_CD = fh.AGENT_CD) as fwCnt FROM MPRODTB mp left outer join SFEESHTB fh ON fh.PROD_CD = mp.PROD_CD left outer join MAGENTTB ag ON ag.AGENT_CD = fh.AGENT_CD WHERE mp.PROD_CL = #{paramProdCl } AND fh.STOP_YN != 'Y' AND fh.PROD_CD != ''
AND ( mp.PROD_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValue }, '%' ) OR mp.PROD_CD LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValue }, '%') OR ag.AGENT_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValue }, '%') OR fh.AGENT_CD LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValue }, '%') )

SELECT fj.PROD_CD as prodCd , fj.PROD_CD as prodCdOld , fj.AGENT_CD as agentCd , fj.AGENT_CD as agentCdOld , fj.PROC_YEAR as procYear , fj.PROC_MONTH as procMonth , mp.PROD_NM as prodNm , aj.AGENT_NM as agentNm , fj.J_AMT as jAmt , fj.REMARKS as remarks ,'R' as iuD FROM SFEESJTB fj -- 도서코드 left outer join MPRODTB mp ON mp.PROD_CD = fj.PROD_CD -- 에이젠트 구분 left outer join MAGENTTB aj ON aj.AGENT_CD = fj.AGENT_CD
WHERE fj.PROC_YEAR = #{paramProcYear } AND fj.PROC_MONTH = #{paramProcMonth } ORDER BY fj.PROD_CD, fj.AGENT_CD

SELECT b.agent_cd as agentCd , b.agent_nm as agentNm , b.s_amt as sAmt , b.w_amt as wAmt , b.o_amt as oAmt , b.j_amt as jAmt , '' as remarks FROM ( SELECT a.agent_cd as agent_cd , ag.AGENT_NM as agent_nm , sum(a.s_amt) as s_amt , sum(a.w_amt) as w_amt , sum(a.o_amt) as o_amt , sum(a.s_amt) - sum(a.w_amt) - sum(a.o_amt) as j_amt
FROM ( SELECT agent_cd as agent_cd , sum(IFNULL(s_amt, 0)) as s_amt -- 선인세 누적합계 , 0 as w_amt , 0 as o_amt FROM SFEESTTB WHERE CONCAT(proc_year, proc_month) <= CONCAT(#{paramYear }, #{paramMonth }) GROUP BY agent_cd
UNION ALL
SELECT agent_cd as agent_cd , 0 as s_amt , sum(IFNULL(o_amt, 0)) as w_amt -- 정산인세 전월누적 합계 , 0 as o_amt FROM SFEESTTB WHERE CONCAT(proc_year, proc_month) < CONCAT(#{paramYear }, #{paramMonth }) AND o_amt != 0 GROUP BY agent_cd
UNION ALL
SELECT agent_cd as agent_cd , 0 as s_amt , 0 as w_amt , sum(IFNULL(o_amt, 0)) as o_amt -- 당월 정산인세 합계 FROM SFEESTTB WHERE CONCAT(proc_year, proc_month) = CONCAT(#{paramYear }, #{paramMonth }) AND o_amt != 0 GROUP BY agent_cd ) a -- 공통코드 (에이젠시) left outer join MAGENTTB ag ON ag.AGENT_CD = a.AGENT_CD
WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY a.AGENT_CD ) b WHERE b.j_amt > 0 OR b.s_amt != 0

SELECT ft.PROC_YEAR as procYear , ft.PROD_CD as prodCd , mp.PROD_NM as prodNm , ft.AGENT_CD as agentCd , ag.AGENT_NM as agentNm , CONCAT(ft.PROC_MONTH, '월') as procMonth , sum(ft.S_AMT) as sAmt , sum(ft.o_AMT) as oAmt , sum(ft.O_QTY) as oQty FROM SFEESTTB ft -- 도서코드 left outer join MPRODTB mp ON mp.PROD_CD = ft.PROD_CD -- 공통코드 (에이젠시) left outer join MAGENTTB ag ON ag.AGENT_CD = ft.AGENT_CD
WHERE ft.PROC_YEAR = #{paramYear } AND mp.PROD_CL = #{paramProdCl } AND NOT(ft.S_AMT=0 AND ft.O_AMT=0 AND ft.O_QTY=0) GROUP BY ft.PROD_CD, ft.AGENT_CD, ft.PROC_MONTH
